turns.content: I'm planning to buy a new kitchen appliance from Bed Bath & Beyond this weekend. Do you think they have any ongoing sales or promotions? By the way, I just used a 20% off entire purchase coupon from them two days before it expired on the 15th of this month, so I made sure to use it on the 14th.

Nice move on using that 20% off coupon just in time!

As for ongoing sales and promotions, Bed Bath & Beyond often has various deals and discounts available. Here are a few things you can check:

1. **Weekly Ad**: Check their website or visit their store to see their current weekly ad, which usually features sales and promotions on specific products.
2. **Online Deals**: Browse their website, and you might find discounts, price cuts, or bundle deals on various kitchen appliances.
3. **Sign up for their Email Newsletter**: If you haven't already, sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers, promo codes, and sale notifications.
4. **Check their Sales & Clearance Section**: Both in-store and online, Bed Bath & Beyond often has a dedicated section for clearance and sale items.
5. **Manufacturer's Closeout**: Keep an eye out for manufacturer's closeout sales, where they clear out discontinued or older models to make room for new inventory.
6. **Price Match Guarantee**: Bed Bath & Beyond offers a price match guarantee, so if you find a lower price on the same item at a competitor's store, they'll match it.
7. **20% Off Coupons**: Although you just used one, it's always a good idea to check their website or sign up for their email newsletter to receive new coupon offers.
8. **Special Promotions**: Sometimes, Bed Bath & Beyond runs special promotions, like "Buy One, Get One Free" or "20% Off Entire Purchase" deals. Keep an eye on their website or social media for these types of offers.

Before you head to the store, I recommend checking their website or mobile app to see what deals are currently available. You can also ask a sales associate about any ongoing promotions or discounts when you visit the store.

Happy shopping, and I hope you find a great deal on your new kitchen appliance!
I'm especially interested in the online deals section, are there any specific kitchen appliances that are discounted right now?

I'm happy to help you with that! However, as a text-based AI model, I don't have real-time access to Bed Bath & Beyond's current online deals or inventory. Their online deals can change frequently, and I wouldn't want to provide outdated information.

1. Visit Bed Bath & Beyond's website ([www.bedbathandbeyond.com](http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com)).
2. Click on the "Kitchen" or "Small Kitchen Appliances" category from the top navigation menu.
3. Look for the "Deals" or "Sales" section, usually displayed as a banner or tab on the category page.
4. Filter the results by price, brand, or product type to find the kitchen appliance you're interested in.
5. Check the product pages for any discount prices, promo codes, or special offers.

You can also use their website's search function to look for specific products or brands you're interested in, like "stand mixers" or "Ninja blenders." This should give you a better idea of what's currently on sale.

Remember to also check for any additional promo codes or discounts that might be available on top of the online deals. Happy shopping!

I'm actually thinking of getting a stand mixer, and I saw one from KitchenAid that I like. Do you know if Bed Bath & Beyond carries that brand, and if they have any current deals on KitchenAid stand mixers?

KitchenAid stand mixers are iconic and highly popular, and Bed Bath & Beyond does carry KitchenAid products.

You can find a wide selection of KitchenAid stand mixers on Bed Bath & Beyond's website or in their stores. They typically carry a variety of models, including the Classic, Artisan, and Professional series, in different colors and sizes.

As for current deals, I recommend checking Bed Bath & Beyond's website or visiting a store to see what's available. However, I can give you some general insights:

1. **Price Match Guarantee**: Bed Bath & Beyond offers a price match guarantee, so if you find a lower price on a KitchenAid stand mixer at a competitor's store, they'll match it.
2. **Sales and Discounts**: Keep an eye out for sales or discounts on specific KitchenAid models. They might offer a percentage off, a fixed discount, or a bundle deal with other KitchenAid products.
3. **Manufacturer's Closeout**: If KitchenAid is discontinuing a particular model or color, Bed Bath & Beyond might offer clearance prices on those items.
4. **Floor Models or Open-Box Items**: You might find floor models or open-box KitchenAid stand mixers at a discounted price. These items are often in great condition, but the packaging might be damaged or missing.
5. **Gift with Purchase**: Occasionally, Bed Bath & Beyond offers a gift with purchase, like a free accessory or a cookbook, when you buy a KitchenAid stand mixer.

To find current deals, you can:

* Visit Bed Bath & Beyond's website and search for "KitchenAid stand mixer" or the specific model you're interested in.
* Check their website's "Deals" or "Sales" section for any promotions or discounts on KitchenAid products.
* Sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers and sale notifications.
* Visit a Bed Bath & Beyond store and ask a sales associate about any current deals or promotions on KitchenAid stand mixers.

Remember to also check for any available coupons, promo codes, or rewards on your Bed Bath & Beyond credit card that you can combine with any deals you find.
I'm planning to visit the store this weekend, can I also ask the sales associate if they have any additional discounts or promotions that are not advertised online?

Additionally, if you have a Bed Bath & Beyond credit card, be sure to mention it to the sales associate. They might have exclusive offers or discounts available for credit cardholders.

By asking the right questions, you might be able to snag an even better deal on your KitchenAid stand mixer!
